page.title: 18 The Sunshine Club.
page.content: The Club was started by the W.R.V.S. in 1972 and there were 50 members. There are now 25 men and women members over 60. The idea is to get these people out of their homes for an enjoyable afternoon and to give them friendship and an interest in outside activities. They meet twice a month on Fridays from 2 pm to 4 pm. Each member pays a small subscription at the beginning of each year and other money is collected from coffee mornings and jumble sales. People are very kind and invite the Club to tea parties and garden parties. Mrs.Curry is the club leader and she is helped by other people who arrange the meetings. They have a very special party at Christmas.
